trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given Reader object, which is the given number of characters long. When a very large UNICODE value is input to a LONGVARCHAR parameter, it may be more practical to send it via a java.io.Reader object. The data will be read from the stream as needed until end-of-file is reached. The JDBC driver will do any necessary conversion from UNICODE to the database char format.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的 Reader 对象，该对象为给定的字符数。当将非常大的UNICODE值输入到 LONGVARCHAR 参数时，通过 java.io.Reader 对象发送它可能更实际。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。JDBC驱动程序将执行从UNICODE到数据库char格式的所有必要转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given Reader object.

trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的 Reader 对象。当将非常大的UNICODE值输入到 LONGVARCHAR 参数时，通过 java.io.Reader 对象发送它可能更实际。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。JDBC驱动程序将执行从UNICODE到数据库char格式的所有必要转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given java.sql.Date object. When the DBMS does not store time zone information, the driver will use the given Calendar object to construct the SQL DATE value to send to the database. With a Calendar object, the driver can calculate the date taking into account a custom time zone. If no Calendar object is specified, the driver uses the time zone of the Virtual Machine that is running the application.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的 java.sql.Date 对象。当DBMS不存储时区信息时，驱动程序将使用给定的 Calendar 对象构造要发送到数据库的SQL DATE 值。使用 Calendar 对象，驱动程序可以考虑自定义时区来计算日期。如果未指定 Calendar 对象，则驱动程序将使用运行应用程序的虚拟机的时区。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given array of bytes. The driver converts this to an SQL VARBINARY or LONGVARBINARY value (depending on the argument's size relative to the driver's limits on VARBINARY values) when it sends it to the database.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的字节数组。驱动程序在将其发送到数据库时，将其转换为SQL VARBINARY 或 LONGVARBINARY 值（取决于参数的大小，相对于驱动程序对 VARBINARY 值的限制）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream, which will have the specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的参数设置为给定的输入流,输入流将具有指定的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream, which will have the specified number of bytes. When a very large ASCII value is input to a LONGVARCHAR parameter, it may be more practical to send it via a java.io.InputStream. Data will be read from the stream as needed until end-of-file is reached. The JDBC driver will do any necessary conversion from ASCII to the database char format.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的输入流，该输入流将具有指定的字节数。当将非常大的ASCII值输入到 LONGVARCHAR 参数时，通过 java.io.InputStream 发送它可能更为实用。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。JDBC驱动程序将执行从ASCII到数据库char格式的所有必要转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream, which will have the specified number of bytes. When a very large Unicode value is input to a LONGVARCHAR parameter, it may be more practical to send it via a java.io.InputStream object. The data will be read from the stream as needed until end-of-file is reached. The JDBC driver will do any necessary conversion from Unicode to the database char format. The byte format of the Unicode stream must be a Java UTF-8, as defined in the Java Virtual Machine Specification.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的输入流，该输入流将具有指定的字节数。当将非常大的Unicode值输入到 LONGVARCHAR 参数时，通过 java.io.InputStream 对象发送它可能更实际。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。JDBC驱动程序将执行从Unicode到数据库char格式的所有必要转换。Unicode流的字节格式必须是Java UTF-8（如Java虚拟机规范中所定义）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream, which will have the specified number of bytes. When a very large binary value is input to a LONGVARBINARY parameter, it may be more practical to send it via a java.io.InputStream object. The data will be read from the stream as needed until end-of-file is reached.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的输入流，该输入流将具有指定的字节数。当将非常大的二进制值输入到 LONGVARBINARY 参数时，通过 java.io.InputStream 对象发送它可能更实际。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的参数设置为给定的输入流。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream. When a very large ASCII value is input to a LONGVARCHAR parameter, it may be more practical to send it via a java.io.InputStream. Data will be read from the stream as needed until end-of-file is reached. The JDBC driver will do any necessary conversion from ASCII to the database char format.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的输入流。当将非常大的ASCII值输入到 LONGVARCHAR 参数时，通过 java.io.InputStream 发送它可能更为实用。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。JDBC驱动程序将执行从ASCII到数据库char格式的所有必要转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the designated parameter to the given input stream. When a very large binary value is input to a LONGVARBINARY parameter, it may be more practical to send it via a java.io.InputStream object. The data will be read from the stream as needed until end-of-file is reached.
trans-unit.target: 将指定参数设置为给定的输入流。当将非常大的二进制值输入到 LONGVARBINARY 参数时，通过 java.io.InputStream 对象发送它可能更实际。数据将根据需要从流中读取，直到到达文件末尾。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired SNIServerNames of the Server Name Indication (SNI) parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器名称指示（SNI）参数的所需 SNIServerName 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired assertion status for the named top-level class in this class loader and any nested classes contained therein.
trans-unit.target: 设置该类加载器中命名的顶层类和其中包含的任何嵌套类的期望断言状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired assertion status for the named top-level class in this class loader and any nested classes contained therein. This setting takes precedence over the class loader's default assertion status, and over any applicable per-package default. This method has no effect if the named class has already been initialized. (Once a class is initialized, its assertion status cannot change.)
trans-unit.target: 设置该类加载器中命名的顶层类和其中包含的任何嵌套类的所需断言状态。这个设置优先于类加载器的默认断言状态,也优先于任何适用的每个包的默认状态。如果命名的类已经被初始化,那么这个方法就没有效果。(一旦一个类被初始化,它的断言状态就不能改变。)

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired byte order for future reads of data values from this stream.
trans-unit.target: 设置未来从该流读取数据值的字节顺序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired byte order for future reads of data values from this stream. For example, the sequence of bytes '0x01 0x02 0x03 0x04' if read as a 4-byte integer would have the value '0x01020304' using network byte order and the value '0x04030201' under the reverse byte order.
trans-unit.target: 设置未来从该流读取数据值时所需的字节顺序。例如,字节序列'0x01 0x02 0x03 0x04'如果以 4 字节整数读取,则使用网络字节顺序时,其值为'0x01020304',反之则为'0x04030201'。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired image type for the destination image, using an ImageTypeSpecifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ImageTypeSpecifier 设置目标图像的所需图像类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the destination to the given ImageOutputStream or other Object.
trans-unit.target: 将目标设置为给定的 ImageOutputStream 或其他 Object 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the destination to the given ImageOutputStream or other Object. The destination is assumed to be ready to accept data, and will not be closed at the end of each write. This allows distributed imaging applications to transmit a series of images over a single network connection. If output is null, any currently set output will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 将目标设置为给定的 ImageOutputStream 或其他 Object 。假定目标已准备好接受数据，并且不会在每次写入结束时关闭。这允许分布式成像应用程序通过单个网络连接传输一系列图像。如果 output 为 null ，则将删除任何当前设置的输出。

trans-unit.source: Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on the two specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 根据两个指定的坐标设置此 Shape 的框架矩形的对角线。

trans-unit.source: Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on the two specified coordinates. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
trans-unit.target: 根据两个指定的坐标设置此 Shape 的框架矩形的对角线。 RectangularShape 的子类使用框架矩形来定义其几何形状。

trans-unit.source: Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on two specified Point2D objects.
trans-unit.target: 基于两个指定的 Point2D 对象设置此 Shape 的框架矩形的对角线。

trans-unit.source: Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on two specified Point2D objects. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
trans-unit.target: 基于两个指定的 Point2D 对象设置此 Shape 的框架矩形的对角线。 RectangularShape 的子类使用框架矩形来定义其几何形状。

trans-unit.source: Sets the difference mode flag value common to all observed MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有观察到的MBeans共有的差异模式标志值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the difference mode flag value.
trans-unit.target: 设置差分模式标志值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the differing notification's on/off switch value common to all observed MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有观察到的MBeans通用的不同通知的开/关开关值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the differing notification's on/off switch value.
trans-unit.target: 设置不同通知的开启/关闭开关值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the digest algorithm from the specified provider.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定提供者的摘要算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the digest algorithm from the specified provider. If no digest algorithm is specified, the default algorithm returned by getDefaultDigestAlgorithm() will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定提供者的摘要算法。如果未指定摘要算法，则将使用 getDefaultDigestAlgorithm() 返回的默认算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the digest algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 设置摘要算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the digest algorithm. If no digest algorithm is specified, the default algorithm returned by getDefaultDigestAlgorithm() will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置摘要算法。如果未指定摘要算法，则将使用 getDefaultDigestAlgorithm() 返回的默认算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the direction of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 设置箭头的方向。

trans-unit.source: Sets the direction.
trans-unit.target: 设定方向。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory name.
trans-unit.target: 设置目录名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory of this file dialog window to be the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 设置该文件对话窗口的目录为指定目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory of this file dialog window to be the specified directory. Specifying a null or an invalid directory implies an implementation-defined default. This default will not be realized, however, until the user has selected a file. Until this point, getDirectory() will return the value passed into this method.
trans-unit.target: 将此文件对话框窗口的目录设置为指定目录。指定 null 目录或无效目录意味着实现定义的默认目录。但是，直到用户选择了文件，该默认设置才会实现。在此之前， getDirectory() 将返回传递给此方法的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory used by the library loader for storing native libraries before they are loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 设置库加载器在将本地库加载到内存之前用于存储本地库的目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory where cache files are to be created.
trans-unit.target: 设置要创建缓存文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory where cache files are to be created. A value of null indicates that the system-dependent default temporary-file directory is to be used. If getUseCache returns false, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在其中创建缓存文件的目录。值为 null 表示将使用系统相关的默认临时文件目录。如果 getUseCache 返回false，则忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the disabled icon at index to icon which can be null.
trans-unit.target: 将 index 处禁用的图标设置为 icon ，可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the disabled icon at index to icon which can be null. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
trans-unit.target: 将 index 处禁用的图标设置为 icon ，可以为 null 。如果该索引处没有选项卡，则会引发内部异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the disabled icon for the button.
trans-unit.target: 设置按钮的禁用图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the disabled selection icon for the button.
trans-unit.target: 设置按钮的禁用选择图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the display mode of this graphics device.
trans-unit.target: 设置该图形设备的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the display mode of this graphics device. This is only allowed if isDisplayChangeSupported() returns true and may require first entering full-screen exclusive mode using setFullScreenWindow(java.awt.Window) providing that full-screen exclusive mode is supported (i.e., isFullScreenSupported() returns true).
trans-unit.target: 设置此图形设备的显示模式。仅当 isDisplayChangeSupported() 返回 true 时才允许这样做，并且可能要求首先使用 setFullScreenWindow(java.awt.Window) 进入全屏独占模式， isFullScreenSupported() 是支持全屏独占模式（即isFullScreenSupported（）返回 true ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the divider location as a percentage of the JSplitPane's size.
trans-unit.target: 将分隔器位置设置为 JSplitPane 大小的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Sets the divider to use when the JSplitPane is configured to not continuously layout.
trans-unit.target: 设置将 JSplitPane 配置为不连续布局时使用的分隔线。

trans-unit.source: Sets the divider to use when the JSplitPane is configured to not continuously layout. This divider will only be used during a dragging session. It is recommended that the passed in component be a heavy weight.
trans-unit.target: 设置将 JSplitPane 配置为不连续布局时使用的分隔线。该分隔符仅在拖动会话期间使用。建议传入的组件比较重。

trans-unit.source: Sets the divider to use.
trans-unit.target: 设置要使用的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drag image parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置拖动图像参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drag image parameter. The image has to be prepared for rendering by the moment of the call. The image is stored by reference because of some performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: 设置拖动图像参数。该图像必须在调用时准备好以便渲染。由于某些性能原因,图像通过引用存储。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop action for the transfer - which must represent a drop - to the given action, instead of the default user drop action.
trans-unit.target: 将传输的投递操作(必须代表投递)设置为给定的操作,而不是默认的用户投递操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop action for the transfer - which must represent a drop - to the given action, instead of the default user drop action. The action must be supported by the source's drop actions, and must be one of COPY, MOVE or LINK.
trans-unit.target: 将传输的放置动作（必须代表放置）设置为给定动作，而不是默认的用户放置动作。该动作必须由源的放置动作支持，并且必须是 COPY ， MOVE 或 LINK 之一。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop mode for this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的投放模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of DropMode.INSERT is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. It offers similar behavior of dropping between text locations, but does so without affecting the actual text selection and caret location.
trans-unit.target: 设置此组件的放置模式。为了向后兼容，此属性的默认值为 DropMode.USE_SELECTION 。但是，建议使用 DropMode.INSERT ，以改善用户体验。它提供了在文本位置之间拖放的类似行为，但这样做不会影响实际的文本选择和插入符号的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of one of the other modes is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. DropMode.ON, for instance, offers similar behavior of showing items as selected, but does so without affecting the actual selection in the list.
trans-unit.target: 设置此组件的放置模式。为了向后兼容，此属性的默认值为 DropMode.USE_SELECTION 。但是，建议使用其他模式之一，以改善用户体验。例如， DropMode.ON 提供类似的行为，即显示所选项目，但这样做不会影响列表中的实际选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of one of the other modes is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. DropMode.ON, for instance, offers similar behavior of showing items as selected, but does so without affecting the actual selection in the table.
trans-unit.target: 设置此组件的放置模式。为了向后兼容，此属性的默认值为 DropMode.USE_SELECTION 。但是，建议使用其他模式之一，以改善用户体验。例如， DropMode.ON 提供类似的行为，即显示所选项目，但这样做不会影响表中的实际选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of one of the other modes is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. DropMode.ON, for instance, offers similar behavior of showing items as selected, but does so without affecting the actual selection in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 设置此组件的放置模式。为了向后兼容，此属性的默认值为 DropMode.USE_SELECTION 。但是，建议使用其他模式之一，以改善用户体验。例如， DropMode.ON 提供类似的行为，即显示所选项目，但这样做不会影响树中的实际选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets the east pane.
trans-unit.target: 设置东窗格。

trans-unit.source: Sets the echo character for this JPasswordField.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JPasswordField 的回显字符。

trans-unit.source: Sets the echo character for this JPasswordField. Note that this is largely a suggestion, since the view that gets installed can use whatever graphic techniques it desires to represent the field. Setting a value of 0 indicates that you wish to see the text as it is typed, similar to the behavior of a standard JTextField.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JPasswordField 的回显字符。请注意，这主要是一个建议，因为安装的视图可以使用其希望代表该字段的任何图形技术。将值设置为0表示您希望看到键入的文本，这与标准 JTextField 的行为类似。

trans-unit.source: Sets the echo character for this text field.
trans-unit.target: 设置该文本字段的回音符。

trans-unit.source: Sets the editor to used by when a cell in this column is edited.
trans-unit.target: 设置编辑此列中的单元格时使用的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the editor used to paint and edit the selected item in the JComboBox field.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于绘制和编辑 JComboBox 字段中所选项目的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the editor used to paint and edit the selected item in the JComboBox field. The editor is used only if the receiving JComboBox is editable. If not editable, the combo box uses the renderer to paint the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于绘制和编辑 JComboBox 字段中所选项目的编辑器。仅当接收到的 JComboBox 是可编辑的时，才使用编辑器。如果不可编辑，则组合框将使用渲染器绘制所选项目。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.setOpaque(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 将索引 i 处的元素设置为 newValue ，其存储效果由 VarHandle.setOpaque(java.lang.Object...) 指定。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.setRelease(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 将索引 i 处的元素设置为 newValue ，具有由 VarHandle.setRelease(java.lang.Object...) 指定的内存效果。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.setVolatile(java.lang.Object...).
trans-unit.target: 将索引 i 处的元素设置为 newValue ，其存储效果由 VarHandle.setVolatile(java.lang.Object...) 指定。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory semantics of setting as if the variable was declared non-volatile and non-final.
trans-unit.target: 将索引 i 处的元素设置为 newValue ，其内存语义为set，就好像该变量被声明为非易失 volatile 且非 final 一样。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at position i to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 将位置 i 的元素设置为给定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置的元素设置为指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the attribute specified. The previous element at that position is discarded. If the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size()) a RuntimeOperationsException should be raised, wrapping the java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置的元素设置为指定的属性。该位置上的先前元素将被丢弃。如果索引超出范围（索引<0 ||索引> size（）），则应引发RuntimeOperationsException，并包装引发的java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the role specified.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置的元素设置为指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the role specified. The previous element at that position is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置上的元素设置为指定的角色。该位置的前一个元素将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the unresolved role specified.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置的元素设置为指定的未解析角色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the unresolved role specified. The previous element at that position is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置上的元素设置为指定的未解析角色。该位置的前一个元素将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element type.
trans-unit.target: 设置元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enabled state of the Action.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 的启用状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enabled state of the Action. When enabled, any component associated with this object is active and able to fire this object's actionPerformed method. If the value has changed, a PropertyChangeEvent is sent to listeners.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 的启用状态。启用后，与此对象关联的任何组件都将处于活动状态，并且能够触发此对象的 actionPerformed 方法。如果值已更改，则将 PropertyChangeEvent 发送给侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enabled state of the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象的启用状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the end index.
trans-unit.target: 设置结束指数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the end index. For use by subclasses of Format.
trans-unit.target: 设置结束索引。供 Format 的子类使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the end of a Range to be after a node
trans-unit.target: 将Range的结尾设置在节点之后。

trans-unit.source: Sets the end position to be before a node.
trans-unit.target: 设置结束位置在节点之前。

trans-unit.source: Sets the endpoint identification algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 设置端点识别算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the entire Vector of parameters to a given Vector.
trans-unit.target: 将整个Vector的参数设置为一个给定的Vector。

trans-unit.source: Sets the entire Vector of sources to a given Vector.
trans-unit.target: 将整个源的Vector设置为一个给定的Vector。

trans-unit.source: Sets the environment that will be returned when getEnvironment() is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置调用getEnvironment()时将返回的环境。

trans-unit.source: Sets the error output for the running evaluation (it's System.err).
trans-unit.target: 设置正在运行的评估的错误输出（它是 System.err ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the error output for the running evaluation (it's System.err). The controlling process and the remote process can share System.err.
trans-unit.target: 设置正在运行的评估的错误输出（它是 System.err ）。控制过程和远程过程可以共享 System.err 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the error state of the stream to true.
trans-unit.target: 将流的错误状态设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the exception handler for this stream to exceptionListener.
trans-unit.target: 将此流的异常处理程序设置为 exceptionListener 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the exception handler for this stream to exceptionListener. The exception handler is notified when this stream catches recoverable exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 将此流的异常处理程序设置为 exceptionListener 。当此流捕获可恢复的异常时，将通知异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the executor to be used for asynchronous and dependent tasks.
trans-unit.target: 设置执行器用于异步和依赖性任务。

trans-unit.source: Sets the expanded icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置展开的图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the expanded state of this JTree.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JTree 的扩展状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the expanded state of this JTree. If state is true, all parents of path and path are marked as expanded. If state is false, all parents of path are marked EXPANDED, but path itself is marked collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JTree 的扩展状态。如果 state 为true，则将 path 和path的所有父级标记为展开。如果 state 为false，则将 path 所有父级标记为EXPANDED，但将 path 本身标记为折叠。

trans-unit.source: Sets the explanation associated with the problem encounter when resolving a link.
trans-unit.target: 设置解决链接时遇到的问题的相关解释。

trans-unit.source: Sets the explanation associated with the problem encountered when resolving a link.
trans-unit.target: 设置解决链接时遇到的问题的相关解释。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extendedKeyUsage criterion.
trans-unit.target: 设置extendedKeyUsage标准。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extendedKeyUsage criterion. The X509Certificate must allow the specified key purposes in its extended key usage extension. If keyPurposeSet is empty or null, no extendedKeyUsage check will be done. Note that an X509Certificate that has no extendedKeyUsage extension implicitly allows all key purposes.
trans-unit.target: 设置extendedKeyUsage标准。在 X509Certificate 必须允许在其扩展密钥用法扩展指定键的目的。如果 keyPurposeSet 为空或 null ，则将不执行extendedKeyUsage检查。请注意，没有extendedKeyUsage扩展名的 X509Certificate 隐式地允许所有密钥用途。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extensible list of properties associated with this image.
trans-unit.target: 设置与此图像相关的可扩展属性列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extension for the given key.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定钥匙的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extension for the given key. If the value is null or the empty string, the extension is removed. Otherwise, the extension must be well-formed or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定密钥的扩展名。如果值为null或空字符串，则扩展名将被删除。否则，扩展名必须格式正确，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extent to
trans-unit.target: 设定以下程度

trans-unit.source: Sets the failure handler to be called by the RMI runtime if server socket creation fails.
trans-unit.target: 设置当服务器套接字创建失败时,RMI运行时要调用的失败处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the failure handler to be called by the RMI runtime if server socket creation fails. By default, if no failure handler is installed and server socket creation fails, the RMI runtime does attempt to recreate the server socket.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器套接字创建失败时RMI运行时要调用的失败处理程序。默认情况下,如果没有安装失败处理程序,并且服务器套接字创建失败,RMI运行时会尝试重新创建服务器套接字。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fallback guarding dynamic linkers.
trans-unit.target: 设置动态链接器的后备保护。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fallback guarding dynamic linkers. Identical to calling setFallbackLinkers(List) with Arrays.asList(fallbackLinkers).
trans-unit.target: 设置后备保护动态链接器。与使用 Arrays.asList(fallbackLinkers) 调用 setFallbackLinkers(List) 相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fallback guarding dynamic linkers. These linkers will be consulted last by the resulting dynamic linker when it is linking call sites, after any autodiscovered and prioritized linkers. If the factory also autodiscovers a linker class matching one of the fallback linkers, the autodiscovered class will be ignored and the explicit fallback instance will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置后备保护动态链接器。当产生的动态链接器链接调用站点时,这些链接器将在任何自动发现的和优先的链接器之后被最后查询。如果工厂也自动发现了一个与回退链接器相匹配的链接器类,那么自动发现的类将被忽略,而显式回退实例将被使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fetch size for this RowSet object to the given number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的获取大小设置为给定的行数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fetch size for this RowSet object to the given number of rows. The fetch size gives a JDBC technology-enabled driver ("JDBC driver") a hint as to the number of rows that should be fetched from the database when more rows are needed for this RowSet object. If the fetch size specified is zero, the driver ignores the value and is free to make its own best guess as to what the fetch size should be.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的获取大小设置为给定的行数。提取大小为启用JDBC技术的驱动程序（“ JDBC驱动程序”）提供了有关在此 RowSet 对象需要更多行时应从数据库获取的行数的提示。如果指定的获取大小为零，则驱动程序将忽略该值，并可以自由地自行猜测获取的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value.
trans-unit.target: 将该更新器管理的对象的字段设置为给定的更新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value. This operation is guaranteed to act as a volatile store with respect to subsequent invocations of compareAndSet.
trans-unit.target: 将此更新程序管理的给定对象的字段设置为给定的更新值。对于后续的 compareAndSet 调用，保证此操作充当易失性存储。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field represented by this Field object on the specified object argument to the specified new value.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Field 对象在指定对象参数上表示的字段设置为指定的新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field represented by this Field object on the specified object argument to the specified new value. The new value is automatically unwrapped if the underlying field has a primitive type.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Field 对象在指定对象参数上表示的字段设置为指定的新值。如果基础字段具有原始类型，则新值将自动展开。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fields of the URL argument to the indicated values.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 参数的字段设置为指示的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fields of the URL argument to the indicated values. Only classes derived from URLStreamHandler are able to use this method to set the values of the URL fields.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 参数的字段设置为指示的值。只有派生自URLStreamHandler的类才能使用此方法来设置URL字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file chooser to allow multiple file selections.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件选择器,允许多文件选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file name.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file system view that the JFileChooser uses for accessing and creating file system resources, such as finding the floppy drive and getting a list of root drives.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JFileChooser 用于访问和创建文件系统资源的文件系统视图，例如查找软盘驱动器并获取根驱动器列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file view to be used to retrieve UI information, such as the icon that represents a file or the type description of a file.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件视图用于检索UI信息,如代表文件的图标或文件的类型描述。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file-pointer offset, measured from the beginning of this file, at which the next read or write occurs.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件指针偏移量,从该文件的开头开始测量,下一次读或写发生的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file-pointer offset, measured from the beginning of this file, at which the next read or write occurs. The offset may be set beyond the end of the file. Setting the offset beyond the end of the file does not change the file length. The file length will change only by writing after the offset has been set beyond the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件指针的偏移量,从文件的开头开始测量,下一次读或写发生的时间。偏移量可以设置在文件结束之后。将偏移量设置在文件结束后,不会改变文件长度。只有在偏移量被设置到文件末尾之外后,通过写入才会改变文件长度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filename filter for this file dialog window to the specified filter.
trans-unit.target: 将此文件对话窗口的文件名过滤器设置为指定的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filename filter for this file dialog window to the specified filter. Filename filters do not function in Sun's reference implementation for Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 将此文件对话窗口的文件名过滤器设置为指定的过滤器。文件名过滤器在 Sun 的 Microsoft Windows 参考实现中不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filter that determines which rows, if any, should be hidden from the view.
trans-unit.target: 设置过滤器,用于确定哪些行(如果有)应该从视图中隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filter that determines which rows, if any, should be hidden from the view. The filter is applied before sorting. A value of null indicates all values from the model should be included.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于确定应从视图中隐藏哪些行（如果有的话）的过滤器。在排序之前应用过滤器。值为 null 表示应包含模型中的所有值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first MIDI tick that will be played in the loop.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个MIDI tick。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first MIDI tick that will be played in the loop. If the loop count is greater than 0, playback will jump to this point when reaching the loop end point.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个MIDI tick。如果循环次数大于0,当到达循环结束点时,播放将跳到这个点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first and last sample frames that will be played in the loop.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个和最后一个采样帧。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first and last sample frames that will be played in the loop. The ending point must be greater than or equal to the starting point, and both must fall within the size of the loaded media. A value of 0 for the starting point means the beginning of the loaded media. Similarly, a value of -1 for the ending point indicates the last frame of the media.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个和最后一个采样帧。结束点必须大于或等于起始点,并且两者都必须在加载媒体的大小之内。起始点的值为0意味着加载媒体的开始。同样,结束点的值为-1表示媒体的最后一帧。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first and last sample frames that will be played in the loop. The ending point must be greater than or equal to the starting point, and both must fall within the the size of the loaded media. A value of 0 for the starting point means the beginning of the loaded media. Similarly, a value of -1 for the ending point indicates the last frame of the media.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个和最后一个采样帧。结束点必须大于或等于起始点,并且两者都必须在加载媒体的大小范围内。起始点的值为0意味着加载媒体的开始。同样,结束点的值为-1表示媒体的最后一帧。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first line indent.
trans-unit.target: 设置第一行缩进。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag for enabling rollover borders on the toolbar and it will also install the appropriate border depending on the state of the flag.
trans-unit.target: 设置在工具栏上启用翻转边框的标志,同时也会根据标志的状态安装相应的边框。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag indicating whether the timer sends past notifications or not.
trans-unit.target: 设置指示定时器是否发送过去通知的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag that determines whether or not this text component is editable.
trans-unit.target: 设置决定该文本组件是否可编辑的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag that determines whether this list allows multiple selections.
trans-unit.target: 设置决定此列表是否允许多选的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag that determines whether this list allows multiple selections. When the selection mode is changed from multiple-selection to single-selection, the selected items change as follows: If a selected item has the location cursor, only that item will remain selected. If no selected item has the location cursor, all items will be deselected.
trans-unit.target: 设置决定此列表是否允许多选的标志。当选择模式从多选改为单选时,所选项目的变化如下。如果选中的项目有位置光标,则只有该项目保持选中状态。如果所选项目没有位置光标,则所有项目将被取消选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag to indicate if when a notification is received for the unregistration of an MBean referenced in a relation, if an immediate "purge" of the relations (look for the relations no longer valid) has to be performed , or if that will be performed only when the purgeRelations method will be explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 设置标志以指示当收到一个关系中引用的MBean被取消注册的通知时,是否必须执行关系的立即 "清除"(查找不再有效的关系),或者是否只有在显式调用purgeRelations方法时才会执行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag to indicate if when a notification is received for the unregistration of an MBean referenced in a relation, if an immediate "purge" of the relations (look for the relations no longer valid) has to be performed, or if that will be performed only when the purgeRelations method is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 设置标志,用于指示当收到一个关系中引用的MBean被取消注册的通知时,是否需要立即对关系进行 "清除"(查找不再有效的关系),或者是否只有在显式调用purgeRelations方法时才会执行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags component of this builder.
trans-unit.target: 设置此生成器的标志组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags component of this builder. On return, the flags component of this builder is a copy of the flags in the given array.
trans-unit.target: 设置此生成器的标志组件。返回时,此生成器的flags组件是给定数组中flags的副本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags component of this builder. On return, the flags component of this builder is a copy of the given set.
trans-unit.target: 设置此生成器的标志组件。返回时,此生成器的标志组件是给定集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the floating location.
trans-unit.target: 设置浮动位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the floating property.
trans-unit.target: 设置浮动属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus owner.
trans-unit.target: 设置焦点所有者。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus owner. The operation will be cancelled if the Component is not focusable. The focus owner is defined as the Component in an application that will typically receive all KeyEvents generated by the user. KeyEvents which map to the focus owner's focus traversal keys will not be delivered if focus traversal keys are enabled for the focus owner. In addition, KeyEventDispatchers may retarget or consume KeyEvents before they reach the focus owner.
trans-unit.target: 设置焦点所有者。如果该Component不可聚焦,该操作将被取消。焦点所有者被定义为应用程序中的组件,它通常会接收用户生成的所有KeyEvents。如果为焦点所有者启用了焦点遍历键,那么映射到焦点所有者的焦点遍历键的KeyEvents将不会被传递。此外,KeyEventDispatchers可能会在KeyEvents到达焦点所有者之前重新锁定或消耗KeyEvents。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus traversal keys for a given traversal operation for this Component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的给定遍历操作的焦点遍历键。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus traversal keys for a given traversal operation for this Component. Refer to Component.setFocusTraversalKeys(int, java.util.Set<? extends java.awt.AWTKeyStroke>) for a complete description of this method.
trans-unit.target: 为该组件的给定遍历操作设置焦点遍历键。有关此方法的完整说明，请参考 Component.setFocusTraversalKeys(int, java.util.Set<? extends java.awt.AWTKeyStroke>) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus traversal keys for a given traversal operation for this Container.
trans-unit.target: 为该容器的指定遍历操作设置焦点遍历键。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus traversal policy that will manage keyboard traversal of this Container's children, if this Container is a focus cycle root.
trans-unit.target: 设置焦点遍历策略,如果该容器是焦点循环根,则该策略将管理该容器的子容器的键盘遍历。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focus traversal policy that will manage keyboard traversal of this Container's children, if this Container is a focus cycle root. If the argument is null, this Container inherits its policy from its focus- cycle-root ancestor. If the argument is non-null, this policy will be inherited by all focus-cycle-root children that have no keyboard- traversal policy of their own (as will, recursively, their focus-cycle- root children).
trans-unit.target: 设置焦点遍历策略,如果该容器是焦点循环根,则该策略将管理该容器子代的键盘遍历。如果参数为空,则此容器将从其焦点循环根的祖先继承其策略。如果参数为非空,该策略将被所有没有自己的键盘遍历策略的 focus cycle-root 子代继承(递归地,它们的 focus cycle-root 子代也是如此)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focusable state of this Component to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将该组件的可聚焦状态设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focusable state of this Component to the specified value. This value overrides the Component's default focusability.
trans-unit.target: 将该组件的可聚焦状态设置为指定值。该值会覆盖该组件的默认聚焦状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focused Window.
trans-unit.target: 设置聚焦窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets the focused Window. The focused Window is the Window that is or contains the focus owner. The operation will be cancelled if the specified Window to focus is not a focusable Window.
trans-unit.target: 设置聚焦窗口。焦点窗口是指包含焦点所有者的窗口。如果指定的聚焦窗口不是可聚焦的窗口,则该操作将被取消。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font attribute.
trans-unit.target: 设置字体属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font family.
trans-unit.target: 设置字体系列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font for this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font of this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font of this container.
trans-unit.target: 设置该容器的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font of this object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font size attribute.
trans-unit.target: 设置字体大小属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font size.
trans-unit.target: 设置字体大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font to be used for this menu component to the specified font.
trans-unit.target: 将该菜单组件的字体设置为指定的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font to be used for this menu component to the specified font. This font is also used by all subcomponents of this menu component, unless those subcomponents specify a different font.
trans-unit.target: 将该菜单组件使用的字体设置为指定的字体。该字体也被该菜单组件的所有子组件使用,除非这些子组件指定了不同的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font to edit with.
trans-unit.target: 设置要编辑的字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font to edit with. null indicates the renderers font should be used. This will NOT override any font you have set in the editor the receiver was instantiated with. If null for an editor was passed in a default editor will be created that will pick up this font.
trans-unit.target: 设置要使用的字体。 null 指示应使用渲染器字体。这不会覆盖您在实例化接收器时在编辑器中设置的任何字体。如果在编辑器中传递了 null ，则将创建一个默认编辑器，该编辑器将选择此字体。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color at index to foreground which can be null, in which case the tab's foreground color will default to the foreground color of this tabbedpane.
trans-unit.target: 将 index 处的 foreground 设置为前景色，可以为 null ，在这种情况下，选项卡的前景色将默认为此 tabbedpane 的前景色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color at index to foreground which can be null, in which case the tab's foreground color will default to the foreground color of this tabbedpane. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
trans-unit.target: 将 index 处的 foreground 设置为前景色，可以为 null ，在这种情况下，选项卡的前景色将默认为此 tabbedpane 的前景色。如果该索引处没有选项卡，则会引发内部异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color for selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 设置所选单元格的前景色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color for selected cells. Cell renderers can use this color to render text and graphics for selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 设置所选单元格的前景色。单元格渲染器可以使用这个颜色来渲染选定单元格的文字和图形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color of this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color of this component. It is up to the look and feel to honor this property, some may choose to ignore it.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的前景色。尊重这个属性由外观决定,有些人可能会选择忽略它。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color of this object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的前景色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 设置前景色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format that dictates the legal values that can be edited and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置决定可编辑和显示的法律值的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format to use for the format element with the given format element index within the previously set pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 设置在之前设置的模式字符串中给定的格式元素索引的格式元素使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format to use for the format element with the given format element index within the previously set pattern string. The format element index is the zero-based number of the format element counting from the start of the pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式元素的格式,在之前设置的模式字符串中,使用给定的格式元素索引。格式元素的索引是格式元素的零基数,从模式字符串开始算起。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format to use for the format elements within the previously set pattern string that use the given argument index.
trans-unit.target: 设置之前设置的模式字符串中使用给定参数索引的格式元素的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format to use for the format elements within the previously set pattern string that use the given argument index. The argument index is part of the format element definition and represents an index into the arguments array passed to the format methods or the result array returned by the parse methods.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式，以用于先前设置的模式字符串中使用给定参数索引的格式元素。参数索引是格式元素定义的一部分，它表示传递给 format 方法的 arguments 数组或由 parse 方法返回的结果数组的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formats to use for the format elements in the previously set pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 设置之前设置的模式字符串中的格式元素要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formats to use for the format elements in the previously set pattern string. The order of formats in newFormats corresponds to the order of format elements in the pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于先前设置的模式字符串中的format元素的格式。 newFormats 中格式的顺序与模式字符串中格式元素的顺序相对应。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formats to use for the values passed into format methods or returned from parse methods.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于传递给 format 方法或从 parse 方法返回的值的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formats to use for the values passed into format methods or returned from parse methods. The indices of elements in newFormats correspond to the argument indices used in the previously set pattern string. The order of formats in newFormats thus corresponds to the order of elements in the arguments array passed to the format methods or the result array returned by the parse methods.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于传递给 format 方法或 parse 方法返回的值的格式。 newFormats 中元素的索引对应于先前设置的模式字符串中使用的参数索引。因此， newFormats 中的格式顺序与传递给 format 方法的 arguments 数组中的元素顺序或由 parse 方法返回的结果数组中的元素顺序相对应。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given calendar field value and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined. This means that isSet(field) will return false, and the date and time calculations will treat the field as if it had never been set. A Calendar implementation class may use the field's specific default value for date and time calculations.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的日历字段值和未定义此 Calendar 的时间值（距Epoch的毫秒偏移）。这意味着 isSet(field) 将返回 false ，并且日期和时间计算将将该字段视为从未设置过。一个 Calendar 实现类可以使用日期和时间计算领域的特定默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given calendar field value and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined. This means that isSet(field) will return false, and the date and time calculations will treat the field as if it had never been set. A Calendar implementation class may use the field's specific default value for date and time calculations.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的日历字段值和未定义此 Calendar 的时间值（距Epoch的毫秒偏移量）。这意味着 isSet(field) 将返回 false ，并且日期和时间计算将把该字段视为从未设置过。一个 Calendar 实现类可以使用日期和时间计算领域的特定默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the grouping size. Grouping size is the number of digits between grouping separators in the integer portion of a number. For example, in the compact number "12,347 trillion" for the US locale, the grouping size is 3. The grouping size must be greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to 127.
trans-unit.target: 设置分组大小。分组大小是数字整数部分中分组分隔符之间的位数。例如，在 US locale 的紧凑数字 "12,347 trillion" 中，分组大小为3。分组大小必须大于或等于零且小于或等于127。

trans-unit.source: Sets the highlighter to be used. By default this will be set by the UI that gets installed. This can be changed to a custom highlighter if desired. The highlighter can be set to null to disable it. A PropertyChange event ("highlighter") is fired when a new highlighter is installed.
trans-unit.target: 设置要使用的荧光笔。默认情况下，这将由安装的UI设置。如果需要，可以将其更改为自定义荧光笔。荧光笔可以设置为 null 以禁用它。安装新的荧光笔时，将触发PropertyChange事件（“ highlighter”）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hints that the ImageConsumer uses to process the pixels delivered by the ImageProducer.
trans-unit.target: 设置ImageConsumer用来处理ImageProducer传送的像素的提示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hints that the ImageConsumer uses to process the pixels delivered by the ImageProducer. The ImageProducer can deliver the pixels in any order, but the ImageConsumer may be able to scale or convert the pixels to the destination ColorModel more efficiently or with higher quality if it knows some information about how the pixels will be delivered up front. The setHints method should be called before any calls to any of the setPixels methods with a bit mask of hints about the manner in which the pixels will be delivered. If the ImageProducer does not follow the guidelines for the indicated hint, the results are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 设置ImageConsumer用来处理ImageProducer传送的像素的提示。ImageProducer 可以以任何顺序传送像素,但是如果 ImageConsumer 知道一些关于如何传送像素的信息,它可以更有效地将像素缩放或转换为目标 ColorModel,或者更高质量。setHints方法应该在任何调用setPixels方法之前被调用,并带有关于像素交付方式的提示位掩码。如果ImageProducer没有遵循指定提示的准则,那么结果就是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hostname verifier used by negotiate() after the TLS handshake has completed and the default hostname verification has failed. setHostnameVerifier() must be called before negotiate() is invoked for it to have effect. If called after negotiate(), this method does not do anything.
trans-unit.target: 设置TLS握手完成且默认主机名验证失败后，由 negotiate() 使用的主机名验证程序。 setHostnameVerifier() 之前一定要叫 negotiate() 被调用它具有效力。如果在 negotiate() 之后调用，则此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hour of this Date object to the specified value. This Date object is modified so that it represents a point in time within the specified hour of the day, with the year, month, date, minute, and second the same as before, as interpreted in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Date 对象的小时设置为指定值。修改了此 Date 对象，使其代表一天中指定小时内的某个时间点，并且年，月，日，分钟和秒与以前相同，在本地时区中进行了解释。

trans-unit.source: Sets the icon at index to icon which can be null. This does not set disabled icon at icon. If the new Icon is different than the current Icon and disabled icon is not explicitly set, the LookAndFeel will be asked to generate a disabled Icon. To explicitly set disabled icon, use setDisableIconAt(). The icon is not shown if a tab component for this tab was specified. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
trans-unit.target: 将 index 处的 icon 设置为icon，可以为 null 。这不会在 icon 处设置禁用图标。如果新图标与当前图标不同，并且未明确设置禁用图标，则将要求LookAndFeel生成禁用图标。要显式设置禁用的图标，请使用 setDisableIconAt() 。如果为此选项卡指定了选项卡组件，则不会显示该图标。如果该索引处没有选项卡，则会引发内部异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the identifier for the table from which this CachedRowSet object was derived to the given table name. The writer uses this name to determine which table to use when comparing the values in the data source with the CachedRowSet object's values during a synchronization attempt. The table identifier also indicates where modified values from this CachedRowSet object should be written.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the current animation frame to the specified value and requests that the progress bar be repainted.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the current animation frame to the specified value and requests that the progress bar be repainted. Subclasses that don't use the default painting code might need to override this method to change the way that the repaint method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 将当前动画帧的索引设置为指定值，并要求重新绘制进度条。不使用默认绘画代码的子类可能需要重写此方法，以更改 repaint 方法的调用方式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the current animation frame, to the next valid value, which results in the progress bar being repainted.
trans-unit.target: 将当前动画帧的索引,设置为下一个有效值,从而导致进度条被重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the current animation frame, to the next valid value, which results in the progress bar being repainted. The next valid value is, by default, the current animation index plus one. If the new value would be too large, this method sets the index to 0. Subclasses might need to override this method to ensure that the index does not go over the number of frames needed for the particular progress bar instance. This method is invoked by the default animation thread every X milliseconds, where X is specified by the "ProgressBar.repaintInterval" UI default.
trans-unit.target: 将当前动画帧的索引设置为下一个有效值，这将导致重新绘制进度条。默认情况下，下一个有效值是当前动画索引加1。如果新值太大，则此方法将索引设置为0。子类可能需要重写此方法，以确保索引不会超过特定进度条实例所需的帧数。默认动画线程每X毫秒调用一次此方法，其中X由“ ProgressBar.repaintInterval” UI默认值指定。

trans-unit.source: Sets the indices of the destination bands where data will be placed.

trans-unit.target: 设置要使用的源波段的指数。不允许有重复的指数。

trans-unit.target: 设置初始的 JNDI 上下文,可以从 JNDI 命名空间中检索 SyncProvider 实现。

trans-unit.source: Sets the input for the running evaluation (it's System.in).

trans-unit.source: Sets the input for the running evaluation (it's System.in). Note: applications that use System.in for snippet or other user input cannot use System.in as the input stream for the remote process.

trans-unit.source: Sets the input method context, which is used to dispatch input method events to the client component and to request information from the client component.

trans-unit.target: 设置窗格的输入选择值，该窗格为用户提供可供选择的项目列表。（UI提供了一个用于选择值之一的小部件。） null 值表示用户通常可以通过 JTextField 来输入所需的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the input source to use to the given ImageInputStream or other Object.

trans-unit.source: Sets the input source to use to the given ImageInputStream or other Object. The input source must be set before any of the query or read methods are used. If input is null, any currently set input source will be removed. In any case, the value of minIndex will be initialized to 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置要用于给定 ImageInputStream 或其他 Object 的输入源。在使用任何查询或读取方法之前，必须设置输入源。如果 input 为 null ，则将删除任何当前设置的输入源。无论如何， minIndex 的值都将初始化为0。

trans-unit.source: Sets the input value in the option pane the receiver is providing the look and feel for based on the value in the inputComponent.

trans-unit.target: 设置用户选择或输入的输入值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the input value that was selected or input by the user. Only used if wantsInput is true. Note that this method is invoked internally by the option pane (in response to user action) and should generally not be called by client programs. To set the input value initially displayed as selected to the user, use setInitialSelectionValue.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户选择或输入的输入值。仅当 wantsInput 为true时使用。请注意，此方法由选项窗格内部调用（响应用户操作），通常不应由客户端程序调用。要设置最初显示为输入给用户的输入值，请使用 setInitialSelectionValue 。

trans-unit.target: 将即时参数设置为 Date 指定的 instant 值。此方法等效于对 setInstant(instant.getTime()) 的调用。

trans-unit.target: 从XML DOM Node 的树中设置此 IIOMetadata 对象的内部状态，该树的语法由给定的元数据格式定义。先前的状态将被丢弃。如果树的结构或内容无效，则将抛出 IIOInvalidTreeException 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the interval for the event that is associated with this event setting.

trans-unit.source: Sets the issuer criterion.
trans-unit.target: 设定发行人标准。

trans-unit.source: Sets the issuer criterion. The specified distinguished name must match the issuer distinguished name in the X509Certificate. If null is specified, the issuer criterion is disabled and any issuer distinguished name will do.
trans-unit.target: 设置发行者标准。指定的专有名称必须与 X509Certificate 中的发行者专有名称匹配。如果指定了 null ，则禁用颁发者标准，并且任何颁发者专有名称都可以。

trans-unit.source: Sets the issuer criterion. The specified distinguished name must match the issuer distinguished name in the X509Certificate. If null, any issuer distinguished name will do.

trans-unit.source: Sets the issuerNames criterion.

trans-unit.target: 设置issuerNames条件。 X509CRL 中的颁发者专有名称必须至少与指定的专有名称之一匹配。如果为 null ，则将使用任何发行者专有名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the iterator to point to the collation element corresponding to the specified character (the parameter is a CHARACTER offset in the original string, not an offset into its corresponding sequence of collation elements).
trans-unit.target: 设置迭代器指向与指定字符相对应的整理元素(参数是原始字符串中的CHARACTER偏移量,而不是进入其对应的整理元素序列的偏移量)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the iterator to point to the collation element corresponding to the specified character (the parameter is a CHARACTER offset in the original string, not an offset into its corresponding sequence of collation elements). The value returned by the next call to next() will be the collation element corresponding to the specified position in the text. If that position is in the middle of a contracting character sequence, the result of the next call to next() is the collation element for that sequence. This means that getOffset() is not guaranteed to return the same value as was passed to a preceding call to setOffset().
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器设置为指向指定字符对应的整理元素(参数是原始字符串中的CHARACTER偏移量,而不是进入其对应的整理元素序列的偏移量)。下一次调用 next()返回的值将是文本中指定位置对应的整理元素。如果该位置位于收缩字符序列的中间,那么下一次调用 next()的结果就是该序列的整理元素。这意味着getOffset()不能保证返回与之前调用setOffset()时传递的值相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key accelerator that will cause the receiving text component to get the focus.
trans-unit.target: 设置使接收文本组件获得焦点的按键加速器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key accelerator that will cause the receiving text component to get the focus. The accelerator will be the key combination of the platform-specific modifier key and the character given (converted to upper case). For example, the ALT key is used as a modifier on Windows and the CTRL+ALT combination is used on Mac. By default, there is no focus accelerator key. Any previous key accelerator setting will be superseded. A '\0' key setting will be registered, and has the effect of turning off the focus accelerator. When the new key is set, a PropertyChange event (FOCUS_ACCELERATOR_KEY) will be fired.
trans-unit.target: 设置将使接收文本组件获得焦点的键加速器。加速器将是特定于平台的修饰键和给定字符的组合键(转换为大写)。例如,Windows上使用ALT键作为修饰键,Mac上使用CTRL+ALT组合。默认情况下,没有焦点加速键。任何以前的键加速器设置都将被取代。'/0'键设置将被注册,并具有关闭焦点加速器的效果。当新的键被设置时,一个PropertyChange事件(FOCUS_ACCELERATOR_KEY)将被触发。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key binding activity.
trans-unit.target: 设置键绑定活动。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key binding registration.
trans-unit.target: 设置密钥绑定注册。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key combination which invokes the menu item's action listeners without navigating the menu hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Sets the key combination which invokes the menu item's action listeners without navigating the menu hierarchy. It is the UI's responsibility to install the correct action. Note that when the keyboard accelerator is typed, it will work whether or not the menu is currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置组合键,在不浏览菜单层次结构的情况下调用菜单项的动作监听器。安装正确的动作是UI的责任。请注意,当输入键盘加速器时,无论当前是否显示菜单,它都会工作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key pair (public key and private key) for this signer.

trans-unit.target: 设置keyUsage标准。在 X509Certificate 必须允许使用指定的keyUsage值。如果为 null ，则不会进行keyUsage检查。请注意，没有keyUsage扩展名的 X509Certificate 隐式允许所有keyUsage值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard mnemonic (shortcut key or accelerator key) for the button.

trans-unit.source: Sets the label for this menu item to the specified label.

trans-unit.source: Sets the language-sensitive orientation that is to be used to order the elements or text within this component. Language-sensitive LayoutManager and Component subclasses will use this property to determine how to lay out and draw components.
trans-unit.target: 设置对语言敏感的方向，该方向将用于对该组件中的元素或文本进行排序。语言敏感的 LayoutManager 和 Component 子类将使用此属性来确定如何布置和绘制组件。

trans-unit.target: 设置JComponent的层属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the layer property on a JComponent. This method does not cause any side effects like setLayer() (painting, add/remove, etc). Normally you should use the instance method setLayer(), in order to get the desired side-effects (like repainting).

trans-unit.source: Sets the layout manager for this container, refer to Container.setLayout(LayoutManager) for a complete description of this method.

If the value at the anchor index is selected, first clear all the values in the range [anchor, oldLeadIndex], then select all the values values in the range [anchor, newLeadIndex], where oldLeadIndex is the old leadIndex and newLeadIndex is the new one.
trans-unit.target: 设置引线选择指数,确保锚点和新引线之间的值全部被选中或全部被取消选择。如果选择了锚点索引处的值,首先清除[anchor,oldLeadIndex]范围内的所有值,然后选择[anchor,newLeadIndex]范围内的所有值,其中oldLeadIndex为旧的引线Index,newLeadIndex为新的引线。

trans-unit.target: 设置左边孩子的缩进。

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the character sequence.

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the character sequence. The sequence is changed to a new character sequence whose length is specified by the argument. For every nonnegative index
trans-unit.target: 设置字符序列的长度。该序列将被改变为一个新的字符序列,其长度由参数指定。对于每一个非负的索引

trans-unit.source: Sets the lenient mode parameter to the value given by lenient.
trans-unit.target: 设置宽松模式参数由给定的值 lenient 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the lenient mode parameter to the value given by lenient. If no lenient parameter is given to this Calendar.Builder, lenient mode will be used in the build method.
trans-unit.target: 设置宽松模式参数由给定的值 lenient 。如果没有为此 Calendar.Builder 提供lenient参数，则将在 build 方法中使用lenient模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the lenient mode parameter to the value given by lenient. If no lenient parameter is given to this Calendar.Builder, lenient mode will be used in the build method.
trans-unit.target: 设置宽松模式参数由给定的值 lenient 。如果没有为此 Calendar.Builder 提供lenient参数，则将在 build 方法中使用lenient模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limit for the maximum number of bytes that can be returned for character and binary column values in a ResultSet object produced by this Statement object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Statement 对象产生的 ResultSet 对象中字符和二进制列值可以返回的最大字节数限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limit for the maximum number of bytes that can be returned for character and binary column values in a ResultSet object produced by this Statement object. This limit applies only to BINARY, VARBINARY, LONGVARBINARY, CHAR, VARCHAR, NCHAR, NVARCHAR, LONGNVARCHAR and LONGVARCHAR fields. If the limit is exceeded, the excess data is silently discarded. For maximum portability, use values greater than 256.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Statement 对象产生的 ResultSet 对象中字符和二进制列值可以返回的最大字节数限制。此限制仅适用于 BINARY ， VARBINARY ， LONGVARBINARY ， CHAR ， VARCHAR ， NCHAR ， NVARCHAR ， LONGNVARCHAR 和 LONGVARCHAR 字段。如果超过限制，多余的数据将被静默丢弃。为了获得最大的可移植性，请使用大于256的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limit for the maximum number of rows that any ResultSet object generated by this Statement object can contain to the given number.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Statement 对象生成的任何 ResultSet 对象可以包含的最大行数限制为给定数目。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limit for the maximum number of rows that any ResultSet object generated by this Statement object can contain to the given number. If the limit is exceeded, the excess rows are silently dropped.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Statement 对象生成的任何 ResultSet 对象可以包含的最大行数限制为给定数目。如果超过了限制，多余的行将被静默删除。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limits of this matcher's region.
trans-unit.target: 设置该匹配器的区域限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limits of this matcher's region. The region is the part of the input sequence that will be searched to find a match. Invoking this method resets the matcher, and then sets the region to start at the index specified by the start parameter and end at the index specified by the end parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置此匹配器区域的限制。该区域是输入序列的一部分，将对其进行搜索以找到匹配项。调用此方法将重置匹配器，然后将区域设置为从 start 参数指定的索引处开始，到 end 参数指定的索引处结束。

trans-unit.source: Sets the line number to the specified argument.
trans-unit.target: 将行号设置为指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the line spacing.
trans-unit.target: 设置行距。

trans-unit.source: Sets the line-wrapping policy of the text area.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本区域的换行策略。

trans-unit.source: Sets the line-wrapping policy of the text area. If set to true the lines will be wrapped if they are too long to fit within the allocated width. If set to false, the lines will always be unwrapped. A PropertyChange event ("lineWrap") is fired when the policy is changed. By default this property is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本区域的换行策略。如果设置为true，则如果线条太长而无法容纳在分配的宽度内，则将对其进行换行。如果设置为false，则这些行将始终被展开。一 PropertyChange 当政策发生变化事件（“lineWrap”）被触发。默认情况下，此属性为false。

trans-unit.source: Sets the link resolved object field of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 设置该异常的链接解析对象字段。

trans-unit.source: Sets the link resolved object field of this exception. This indicates the last successfully resolved object of link name.
trans-unit.target: 设置该异常的链接解析对象字段。这表示最后成功解析的链接名对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of CertStores to be used in finding certificates and CRLs.
trans-unit.target: 设置要用于查找证书和CRL的 CertStore 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of CertStores to be used in finding certificates and CRLs. May be null, in which case no CertStores will be used. The first CertStores in the list may be preferred to those that appear later.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于查找证书和CRL 的 CertStore 的列表。可以为 null ，在这种情况下将不使用 CertStore 。列表中的第一个 CertStore 可能比后面出现的优先。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of selected files if the file chooser is set to allow multiple selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件选择器设置为允许多选,则设置所选文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of thumbnails to a new List of BufferedImages, or to null.
trans-unit.target: 将缩略图列表设置为新的 BufferedImage List ，或者设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of thumbnails to a new List of BufferedImages, or to null. The reference to the previous List is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 将缩略图列表设置为新的 BufferedImage List ，或者设置为 null 。对上一个 List 的引用将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list properties that have not been explicitly overridden to null.
trans-unit.target: 将尚未显式覆盖的列表属性设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list properties that have not been explicitly overridden to null. A property is considered overridden if its current value is not a UIResource.
trans-unit.target: 将尚未显式覆盖的列表属性设置为 null 。如果属性的当前值不是 UIResource ,则将其视为已重写。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale of this BeanContext.
trans-unit.target: 设置该BeanContext的locale。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale of this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的locale。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale of this component. This is a bound property.
trans-unit.target: 设置该组件的locale。这是一个绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale parameter to the given locale.
trans-unit.target: 将locale参数设置为给定的 locale 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale parameter to the given locale. If no locale is given to this Calendar.Builder, the default Locale for Locale.Category.FORMAT will be used.
trans-unit.target: 将locale参数设置为给定的 locale 。如果没有为此 Calendar.Builder 提供 Locale ，则将使用 Locale.Category.FORMAT 的默认语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale parameter to the given locale. If no locale is given to this Calendar.Builder, the default {@code Locale} for Locale.Category.FORMAT will be used.
trans-unit.target: 将locale参数设置为给定的 locale 。如果没有为此 Calendar.Builder 提供语言环境，则将使用 Locale.Category.FORMAT 的默认{@code Locale}。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale parameter to the given locale. If no locale is given to this Calendar.Builder, the default Locale for Locale.Category.FORMAT will be used.
trans-unit.target: 将locale参数设置为给定的 locale 。如果没有为此 Calendar.Builder 提供 Locale ，则将使用 Locale.Category.FORMAT 的默认语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale to be applied when formatting diagnostics and other localized data.
trans-unit.target: 设置在格式化诊断程序和其他本地化数据时要应用的语言。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale to be used when creating or comparing subformats.
trans-unit.target: 设置创建或比较子格式时要使用的语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale to be used when creating or comparing subformats. This affects subsequent calls
trans-unit.target: 设置创建或比较子格式时要使用的locale。这将影响后续对

trans-unit.source: Sets the localized accessible name of this object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的本地化访问名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the localized accessible name of this object. Changing the name will cause a PropertyChangeEvent to be fired for the ACCESSIBLE_NAME_PROPERTY property.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的本地化可访问名称。更改名称将导致 PropertyChangeEvent 为被解雇 ACCESSIBLE_NAME_PROPERTY 财产。

trans-unit.source: Sets the localized display name of this feature.
trans-unit.target: 设置该功能的本地化显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the framing rectangle of this Shape to the specified Point2D and Dimension2D, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Shape 的框架矩形的位置和大小分别设置为指定的 Point2D 和 Dimension2D 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the framing rectangle of this Shape to the specified Point2D and Dimension2D, respectively. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Shape 的框架矩形的位置和大小分别设置为指定的 Point2D 和 Dimension2D 。 RectangularShape 的子类使用框架矩形来定义其几何形状。
